name.title: Title Command Name
name.description: Define how should the title command be called. Only accepts A to Z 0 to 9 and _ characters.

template.title: Title Templace
template.description:
Define how the title displays. You can use these variables:
* `$title$`: Page title
* `$name$`: Project name
